titleStmt.title: Cassander Anglicanus shewing the necessity of conformitie to the prescribed ceremonies of our church, in case of depriuation. By Iohn Sprint, minister of Thornbury in Glocester-shire, sometimes of Christ-Church in Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Sprint, John, d. 1623.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" with a woodcut ornament.
Reproduction of the original in the Newberry Library.
